item.title: ShaderGraph Effects - Shield Effect Collection
item.description: Figure 1 is a traced work, and Figure 2 is a secondary creation using the hexagonal shield explosion effect.

item.title: ShaderGraph Effect Works
item.description: Followed the tutorials of bilibili’s ÊµÆÁîüËã•Ê¢¶Jason, I got started with HDRP and ShaderGraph This flame is an outer flame, inner flame, flame core, halo, fire sparks, and smoke, made from sequence images Iron flower. Particle collision was added so that there is a fire sparks flying effect on the ground; added point lights to particles; particles stretch with speed A meteor/fireball summoning spell. Using Sub Emitters, this feature can also be used for fireworks and the like!

item.title: Item with image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: [ AE MG Animation ] Patchwork of Broken Sounds
[ Maya Animation ] Cats and Monster
item.description: Maya 3D animation. Maya modeling and animation, Mental Ray rendering, and AE post-production packaging.

item.title: [ AE Animation ] Nice Day

item.title: [ Live-action + Compositing ] Hercraft
item.description: A short-semester assignment during the second half of my junior year. It is a creative short film derived from the game “Minecraft”. It includes live-action footage, C4D animation, and AE compositing.
